alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Knott; Perry (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 5:22PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Perry, northwestern Knott and southeastern Breathitt Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 521 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ned, or 10 miles southeast of Jackson, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Rowdy and Hardshell around 530 PM EDT. Noble around 535 PM EDT. Buck around 540 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Decoy, Daisydell and Elmrock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
